title: My First Projects
shortDesciprition: My first projects were simple plugins for the game Minecraft. So the first programming language I learned was Java, and it is still one of my favorite languages today.

title: Melion - The first Milestone
shortDesciprition: Melion was a Minecraft project that I worked on from July 2020 to February 2021. Even though this is a relatively short time, I learned a lot about coding principles and also found my way into web development.

title: Venterion - Another Minecraft Project
shortDesciprition: After Melion, I started the Venterion project with friends. I was responsible for managing the projects and leading the development team. This is were I got most of my experience in server administration and DevOps.

title: Metahond Development - Welcome to the Web
shortDesciprition: When I lost interest in developing Minecraft plugins, Fl4wless and I were interested in web development and we started working on a new project together: Metahond.

title: Hondicard - Metahond's Debut
shortDesciprition: After learning the basics, we started working on our first project: Hondicard. We are still working on it and we have made a lot of progress since we started.
